section.12: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) often used to say when bowing and prostrating: 'Subhanaka Rabbana wa bi Hamdika, Allahumm aghfirli (Glorfy and praise be to You, our Lord. O Allah, forgive me)
